subject: Re: [junit] Re: Unit Testing an EJB
msgSnippet: ... Testing as a Design Activity Now there is a book I would buy in a heart beat. Because, as many of the posts in this forum inquire, How do I go about
messageBody:
Mike Clark wrote:

> People tell me that books and articles with "testing" in the title
> don't sell as well as they'd like. It's a shame really, and I hope to
> help change that mentality. One of my tactics in doing so, as you
> well know, is to convince readers that testing is also a design
> activity.

"Testing as a Design Activity"

Now there is a book I would buy in a heart beat. Because, as many of
the posts in this forum inquire, "How do I go about designing my testing

strategy?"
